title: JSON schema for zApi Kotlin plugins.

pluginDependencies.description: List of required plugin dependencies, with specific versions.

additionalProperties.description: A required plugin dependency. More information about the version range format: https://github.com/npm/node-semver.

softPluginDependencies.description: List of optional plugin dependencies, with specific versions.

additionalProperties.description: An optional plugin dependency. More information about the version range format: https://github.com/npm/node-semver.

minecraftVersion.description: Required Minecraft version to run the plugin. More information about the version range format: https://github.com/npm/node-semver.

files.description: List of configuration files (or any other type) to save into the plugin's directory.

urls.description: A list of URLs for this project.

bugs.description: URL to a bug report page.

load.description: The phase of server-startup this plugin will load during.

apiVersion.description: Gives the API version which this plugin is designed to support.
